name: Eleven/River
description:
My version of a userstyle personally for my dash.
Eleventh Doctor and River Song.
Doctor Who :)

user.name: Cycat4077
user.about: Have a request? Ask me on my tumblr (by the same name) :D

additional_info:
Modification of "http://userstyles.org/styles/74496/ultimate-whovian-module-vii-tardis-dashboard" Tardis dashboard style.

To modify to fit your screen best, click "show CSS" and just paste in the photo you want:

Image link 1280x720: http://s39.radikal.ru/i083/1104/10/453149fbd78a.jpg
Image link 1920x1080: http://images5.fanpop.com/image/photos/25900000/Doctor-River-6x02-Day-Of-The-Moon-the-doctor-and-river-song-25921035-1920-1080.jpg

If these still won't do, modify with paint and upload on an image host site like photobucket and copy the image link and paste! Viola!
